data.comment: The match has started.
At Signal Iduna Park, Dortmund are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 2, Stuttgart's Orel Mangala gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
Stuttgart pushes forward through Silas Wamangituka, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Stuttgart.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Dortmund at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 6, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Stuttgart close to the penalty box.
In Dortmund Stuttgart drive forward through Philipp Forster. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
In the minute 8, Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Stuttgart drive upfield and Tanguy Coulibaly gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Stuttgart in Dortmund.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Free kick Stuttgart.
Stuttgart are caught offside.
In the minute 13, Tanguy Coulibaly of Stuttgart gets in a strike, but is off target.
Christian Dingert awards Dortmund a goal kick.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Dortmund.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Dortmund Dortmund's Marco Reus is caught offside.
In the minute 19, Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In Dortmund Dortmund attack through Jude Bellingham. The finish is off target, however.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Konstantinos Mavropanos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Stuttgart's Konstantinos Mavropanos looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 25, An attacking Stuttgart player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Christian Dingert signals a Dortmund throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
Emre Can for Dortmund has been booked by Christian Dingert and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 26, Silas Wamangituka nets and Stuttgart now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 28, At Signal Iduna Park, Konstantinos Mavropanos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Dortmund needs to be cautious. Stuttgart have an attacking throw-in.
Stuttgart's Tanguy Coulibaly is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Stuttgart are coming forward and Mateo Klimowicz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Can Stuttgart capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dortmund's half?
In the minute 32, Free kick for Dortmund in the half of Stuttgart.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
In Dortmund a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, Emre Can for Dortmund gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
In the minute 35, Dortmund push upfield and Mats Hummels gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Stuttgart defence.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Throw-in for Stuttgart close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Stuttgart's Mateo Klimowicz gets in a shot on goal at Signal Iduna Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! Giovanni Reyna equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 39, Great play from Raphael Guerreiro to set up the goal.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wataru Endo is booked for the away team.
In the minute 41, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Silas Wamangituka (Stuttgart) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 44, Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Christian Dingert signals a Dortmund throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
At Signal Iduna Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
Mats Hummels's header is off-target for Dortmund.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at Signal Iduna Park.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Dortmund.
The second-half is now underway.
Jadon Sancho (Dortmund) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 48, Mateu Morey (Dortmund) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
Dortmund have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
Silas Wamangituka (Stuttgart) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Mateo Klimowicz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Stuttgart.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Silas Wamangituka.
In the minute 52, Orel Mangala instrumental with a fine assist.
Christian Dingert signals a throw-in for Stuttgart, close to Dortmund's area.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dortmund.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
Dortmund make their first substitution with Reinier replacing Emre Can.
In the minute 60, Goal! Philipp Forster extends Stuttgart's lead to 1-3.
Borna Sosa with an assist there.
Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Dortmund.
In the minute 62, So close for Stuttgart as Mateo Klimowicz's shot comes back off the post.
Stuttgart drive upfield and Philipp Forster gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dortmund defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Goal! Stuttgart extend their lead to 1-4 through Tanguy Coulibaly.
That's a fine assist from Silas Wamangituka.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Stuttgart.
In the minute 65, Nico Schulz is on a sub for Jude Bellingham for Dortmund.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
In the minute 66, Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mateu Morey (Dortmund) has received a yellow card from Christian Dingert.
Nicolas Gonzalez is replacing Tanguy Coulibaly for the away team.
In the minute 67, Roberto Massimo is replacing Silas Wamangituka for Stuttgart at Signal Iduna Park.
Free kick Dortmund.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Axel Witsel (Dortmund) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Christian Dingert signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to Stuttgart's area.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Stuttgart in their own half.
Christian Dingert signals a free kick to Dortmund.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Christian Dingert.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Stuttgart.
The away team replace Philipp Forster with Lilian Egloff.
In the minute 78, Dortmund have a dangerous throw-in.
Stuttgart are pushing forward but Nicolas Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
Christian Dingert awards Dortmund a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Jadon Sancho of Dortmund smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Stuttgart will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dortmund.
Christian Dingert awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Dortmund close to the penalty box.
Dortmund's Nico Schulz breaks free at Signal Iduna Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
In the minute 86, Dan-Axel Zagadou is on a sub for Manuel Akanji for Dortmund.
The home team have replaced Raphael Guerreiro with Youssoufa Moukoko. This is the fourth substitution made today by Lucien Favre.
Julian Brandt is replacing Jadon Sancho for the home team.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a fourth substitution, with Pascal Stenzel replacing Konstantinos Mavropanos.
Stuttgart make their fifth substitution with Darko Churlinov replacing Mateo Klimowicz.
In Dortmund, Stuttgart push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Christian Dingert will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Dortmund in Dortmund.
Dortmund drives forward and Youssoufa Moukoko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Christian Dingert blows to end the match. The final score is 1-5.
It's now 1-5 in Dortmund as Nicolas Gonzalez scores for Stuttgart.
That's a fine assist from Orel Mangala.
